title: reverted back to the old client then tried to update back to new now nothing works
body:
Nothing happens when I try to update to the new client, 
But I originally updated to the new client and then went back to the old client because the new client was very slow for me at the time 
But once I went to the old client league just stopped working so in my mind I was like what ever I'll just go back to the new one
and now nothing happens when I try to update to the new client Really need help PLEASE, also my client doesn't allow me to repair either 
PLEASE! HELP!
I have had this problem for the last 6 months
just recently started going to my friends house once a week to play which sucks..

replies.body: I really want to help and get you back in game, but I could really use more specific information.  What do you mean exactly by nothing works?  Are you getting any error messages?  Where does it happen?  Let me know, and I'll get back to you.
